tooltip: Select Princess Tetralyna Zelda V as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Princess Zelda focuses on improving Crossbowmen and improving Rupee generation to summon her Unique Unit.
Allows you to summon Princess Zelda, a Mage hero that can fling spells and carriers a protective sword.
Red Lion Cavalry Commanders and Kingdom Heavy Cavalry, ranged units that deal magic damage and stun enemies.
Unique Building that provides diverse technologies.
